text: Alʙatta Alloh ʙar şumo harom gardonidaast, on cizero ki ʙar şumo zarar meorad, ʙa monandi xudmurda, xun va gūşti xuk va on ciro, ki dar vaqti zaʙh nomi ƣajri Alloh ʙar on ʙixonand. Va az fazlu rahmati Alloh ast ʙar şumo, ki muʙoh gardonid xūrdani cizhoi haromşudaro, hangome ki maçʙur şavad, ʙa qadri zarurat va az had naguzaronad, pas ʙar vaj gunohe nest. Ba durustī, Alloh omurzanda va ʙaxşojanda ast
